title: Andrij Shevchenko
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020103233/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020103233/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Andrij Shevchenko**

Multi-talented Ukrainian designer and calligrapher. His font [AndrijHand](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020103233/http:/typophile.com/node/3823) seems to be one of the first posted to [Typophile](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020103233/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typophile)'s [Critique Forums](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020103233/http:/typophile.com/forum/1). He has gone on to develop many more fonts based on his own luxurious calligraphic style.  
He founded [AndrijType](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020103233/http:/andrij.com.ua/eng/)
author: paul d hunt
